General.Name: Humax Co. Ltd
General.Description: Humax Co., Ltd. provides video gateways, set-top boxes, and broadband gateways for broadcasting companies and telecommunication operators worldwide. It also offers smart home solutions through digital broadcasting and communication technology. In addition, the company offers set-top box, broadband gateway, and video gateway products. In addition, the company offers car infotainment/antenna, automotive infotainment systems and vehicle antennas, mobility; and IoT solutions. The company operates approximately in 80 countries. Humax Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
